subtitle: Tender noisettes of lamb topped with a home-made pesto sauce.

method.text: Place the parsley, walnuts and garlic into a blender or food processor and whizz until finely chopped. Add the cheese and oil and process until blended. Season.
Press equal amounts of pesto onto both sides of the loins and set aside.
Heat the oil for roasting in a roasting tin. Add the potatoes and toss to ensure they are coated in oil. Season well.
Arrange the loins of lamb on the potato and roast for 35-40 min or until the potatoes are tender and the lamb is cooked.

title: Lamb with pesto and new potatoes
